contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have a question or need assistance? Reach out to our support team.

items.question: How do I set up my dietary preferences?
items.answer: Go to Settings > Dietary Preferences in the app. You can select your diet type, allergies, and food preferences. PanPlans will use this information to personalize your meal suggestions.

items.question: Can I share my meal plans with family members?
items.answer: Yes! PanPlans supports family sharing. Go to Settings > Family to invite family members. They can view and contribute to shared meal plans and shopping lists.

items.question: How do I add items to my pantry?
items.answer: Open the Pantry tab and tap the '+' button. You can manually add items, scan barcodes, or add items from your shopping list when you purchase them.

items.question: Is my data backed up?
items.answer: Yes, your data is automatically synced to our secure cloud servers. You can access your meal plans, pantry, and recipes from any device signed into your account.

items.question: How do I delete my account?
items.answer: You can delete your account in Settings > Account > Delete Account. This will permanently remove all your data. See our Account Management page for detailed instructions.

items.question: Can I use PanPlans offline?
items.answer: Yes, PanPlans works offline for basic features. Your data will sync automatically when you reconnect to the internet.
